title: My new account didnt receive starter hextech chests?
body: I didnt get the 2 hextech chests that you get when u hit level 5. The one with ashe and garen and then the other one

replies.body: it may take a few moments or a relog to get your new player chest to appear on your account.  I'd say give it about a day to be sure, but if you still don't have it go ahead and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll respond asap!
